body:
Nodes can't recognize the static pods that they create possibly because the defaulting is different.

`IsMirrorPodOf` always returns false. https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/release-1.1/pkg/kubelet/pod_manager.go#L255

Here is a json diff of two pod specs before and after they are Semenatic.DeepEqual'd where before is created pod and after is what kubelet things the created pod should be.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1787169/10617027/0c96b3b0-771d-11e5-9f78-e46917c67880.png)

Thus:

```
I1020 18:13:49.326315    3290 server.go:635] GET /healthz: (591.942µs) 0 [[curl/7.26.0] 127.0.0.1:50831]
W1020 18:13:50.396406    3290 status_manager.go:80] Failed to updated pod status: error updating status for pod "fluentd-cloud-logging-k-2-minion-j6nw_kube-system": pods "fluentd-cloud-logging-k-2-minion-j6nw" not found
E1020 18:13:50.653880    3290 kubelet.go:1252] Deleting mirror pod "fluentd-cloud-logging-k-2-minion-j6nw_kube-system" because it is outdated
E1020 18:13:52.325698    3290 kubelet.go:1252] Deleting mirror pod "fluentd-cloud-logging-k-2-minion-j6nw_kube-system" because it is outdated
```

p0 for triage

@dchen1107 @bgrant0607 @davidopp @ihmccreery @yujuhong

labels.description: Indicates an issue on api area.
labels.name: area/api

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

milestone.description:
Release 1.1.

P1 features:
* 250+ nodes, at our published SLO
* kube-proxy perf. improvements (via IPTables)
* Docker 1.8.x
* Horizontal pod auto-scaling
* Job
* Ingress
* Schema validation in kubectl
* Experimental API and API groups
* Graceful pod termination
milestone.title: v1.1

title: Mirror pods in a delete create loop in version skewed cluster (1.1 master, 1.0 node)
